name: distributed

chunks.text:
Distributed
===========

Test Status

A library for distributed computation.  See documentation_ for more details.

usage_description:
Here is a 2-sentence summary of what a developer can achieve with this library:

This library is used to scale and distribute computations across multiple machines or processes, enabling large-scale data processing and parallelization. By utilizing the Distributed scheduler for Dask, developers can efficiently manage and execute complex distributed tasks, taking advantage of multiple cores and nodes in their computing infrastructure.
